title: Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund (NASDAQ:BRRR) Sees Large Drop in Short Interest
description: Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund (NASDAQ:BRRR - Get Free Report) was the recipient of a significant drop in short interest in December. As of December 15th, there was short interest totalling 3,300 shares, a drop of 25.0% from the November 30th total of 4,400 shares. Based on an average daily trading volume, of 263,600 shares, the short-interest ratio is currently 0.0 days.

title: Global Miranda pushes crypto adoption through education
